channel.title: Big Question
channel.description: [b]My parents say they can monitor what I can do on my computer(the have a laptop) but i dont know if thats true or not if they can plaese tell me. Also please tell me how to stop it its really :confused:!!!!!!!!!![/b]

item.title: Big Question
item.dc:creator: @teh_hacker teh_hacker
item.description:
@teh_hacker wrote:

your parents might have winspy, which is a program that keylogs your pc for monitoring use, and it also makes a video feed by taking a screenshot every 500ms and making all of those pics into a video.

Read full topic

item.title: Big Question
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

oh another good one, look for msmsngr in ur task manager or autorun, it could be the server side of errmess…and the newest version of that program can moniter visited websites, keyog remote pc, delete system files, send fake error messages, draw on the screen, fick with the mouse… all sorts of fun stuff lol

Read full topic

item.title: Big Question
item.dc:creator: @MidGuardian MidGuardian
item.description:
@MidGuardian wrote:

My friend, k0rupt.net knew a program where u can see everything a person does on their computer. Forgot the name though it’s used throughout our school too…

Read full topic

item.title: Big Question
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

hmm try searching ur pc for sfklg or sumthin like that, its a keylogger for personal use, that is undetectable. doesn’t show up in task manager or anything. But that one only works if they have can get on ur pc, if they cannot get on then just check the exceptions in ur firewall, because if they have one sending data it should be in there…best i got…

Read full topic

item.title: Big Question
item.dc:creator: @fivestar5 fivestar5
item.description:
@fivestar5 wrote:

For one thing I am not a dumbass, I was in a rush so i was not able to type correctly.
And i think i am connected to other computers because im on a wireless network.
2.Right now im going to go check their laptop and then check mine.
thanks for the info.

Read full topic

item.title: Big Question
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

Its possible they have activity monitoring software on your machine. I doubt they would install a mere keylogger, so just have a look through your Program Files for anything out of the ordinary. Even if they don’t have any specific software, they can check up on you by going through histories and temporary internet files…obviously, those are easy enough to cover up though

Read full topic

item.title: Big Question
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Just go through your programs for anything suspicious, also check your network and make sure your not connected to any other computer. Then again by the quality of your spelling you are probably a dumbass who doesn’t know how to do that.

Either they are idiots and are telling the truth (I know I wouldn’t, i would wait to see what my kid(s) is/are up to.) or they are just making empty threats, in which case your should … H4X dem pl0x!!!

Read full topic
